text: The men's 110 metres hurdles event at the 2003 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Bydgoszcz, Poland, at Zawisza Stadion on 18 and 20 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Ladji Doucouré ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Philip Nossmy ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Gregory Sedoc ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 20 July Wind: 0.6m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
